item.title: Adding global objects error!
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:5, topic:138945”][code]}
}
public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
}
}
}
}
public void NewObjects(){
makeGlobalObject(2814, 3348, 2466, 0, 10); //Fighter Torso Mini Game Portal
}
public void NewObjects(){
makeGlobalObject(2614, 3097, 9368, 0, 10); //Door’s at ::home left and right.
}
public void deletethatwall(int objectX, int objectY) {
ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 0);
}

public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY) {
ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10);
}

public void Deleteobjects() {
deletethatobject(2965,3381);
deletethatobject(3092,3488);
deletethatobject(3095,3491);
deletethatobject(3095,3498);
deletethatobject(3091,3495);

deletethatobject(2611,3095);
deletethatobject(2611,3096);
deletethatobject(2612,3097);
deletethatobject(2611,3097);
}[/code][/quote]

No…Wrong method.

item.title: Adding global objects error!
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Ok, i’ve been attempting to add Global objects. It hasn’t worked. I got down from 100 errors - 1 error now.

But i cannot fix this 1. No matter what, can someome tell me WHAT is up? And HOW to fix it please.

The error:

client.java:184: illegal start of expression public void NewObjects(){ ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Where the error is coming from

[code]}

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
}
}
}
}
public void NewObjects(){
makeGlobalObject(2814, 3348, 2466, 0, 10); //Fighter Torso Mini Game Portal
}
public void NewObjects(){
makeGlobalObject(2614, 3097, 9368, 0, 10); //Door’s at ::home left and right.
}
public void deletethatwall(int objectX, int objectY) {
ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 0);
}

public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY) {
ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10);
}

public void Deleteobjects() {
deletethatobject(2965,3381);
deletethatobject(3092,3488);
deletethatobject(3095,3491);
deletethatobject(3095,3498);
deletethatobject(3091,3495);
deletethatobject(3090,3494);
deletethatobject(2614,3088);
deletethatobject(2614,3097);
deletethatobject(2616,3089);
deletethatobject(2616,3093);
deletethatobject(2616,3097);
deletethatobject(2611,3095);
deletethatobject(2611,3096);
deletethatobject(2612,3097);
deletethatobject(2611,3097);
}[/code]

The error is in that part somehow. Someone please point out / edit what is wrong.
